snippet: Nine corrections officers suffered minor injuries in an assault and a riot at the privately run Arizona State Prison-Kingman.
abstract: Hundreds of inmates at Arizona State Prison-Kingman, which is privately run by Centerville, Utah, company Management & Training Corporation, are moved to other facilities after housing units are left uninhabitable by two riots on consecutive days; authorities are investigating disturbances.
lead_paragraph: Nine corrections officers suffered minor injuries in an assault and a riot at the privately run Arizona State Prison-Kingman.

headline.main: Arizona Moves 700 Inmates After Violence Inside Prison
headline.print_headline: Arizona Moves 700 Inmates After Violence Inside Prison
